page.title: 20OPINIONS OF CLASS 4/5
page.content: Our class discussed things which concerned them most.Pupils suggested questions and voted to show agreement or disagreement: 1/.Do you think that experiments on animals are acceptable? {YES 0 NO 37 UNDECIDED 2 2/.Do you think that it is acceptable for people to smoke? {YES 8 NO 26 UNDECIDED 5 3/.Do you think it is acceptable to show violence on television? {YES 32 NO 3 UNDECIDED 4 { { This record of aspects of our {communtiy was compiled by children of {Class 4/5 of St. Budock C. of E. {School and their teacher, Mrs. S. {Griffiths.It was completed in {September 1985. }
